
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18653874" title="发布于 2025-01-06 08:00">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">将 EasySQLite 从 .NET 8 升级到 .NET 9</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">前言</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">EasySQLite是一个.NET 8操作SQLite入门到实战的详细教程，主要是对学校班级，学生信息进行管理维护。今天咱们的主要内容是将EasySQLite从.NET 8升级到.NET 9。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>GitHub开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/EasySQLite" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/EasySQLite</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204611543-219331504.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">选型、开发详细教程</h2>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247493747&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=0fee4088dea1e27b0e4376263ea1c026&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第一天 SQLite 简介</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247493831&amp;idx=2&amp;sn=0a7a95bfe948a32c706960eb76430006&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第二天 在 Windows 上配置 SQLite环境</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247493958&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=7ff27813aa3f9145f5b80f7ad68090d2&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第三天SQLite快速入门</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247494241&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=dfafe13baea0e717e7e4c9fcfae15ad5&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第四天EasySQLite前后端项目框架搭建</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247494291&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=14ca57e97da736ebc644e7303684d9bf&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第五天引入 SQLite-net ORM 并封装常用方法</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247494504&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=fcd8c9aaff3db4b9eb0ee443f621c1cf&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第六天后端班级管理相关接口完善和Swagger自定义配置</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247495569&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=ccef97495eaaf53f0690974d0a8cd663&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第七天BootstrapBlazor UI组件库引入（1）</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247499487&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=f709723882052fd0da87c9fb2a788229&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第七天Blazor班级管理页面编写和接口对接（2）</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247503380&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=ec931b964ac9ce26abd2b44ded6d0892&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">第七天Blazor学生管理页面编写和接口对接（3）</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">.NET 9介绍</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">.NET 9是微软于2024年11月13日推出的一个重大版本，被誉为迄今为止最高效、最现代、最安全、最智能、性能最高的.NET版本。.NET 9是标准期限支持 (STS) 版本，它将在18个月内受到支持。</p>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204637681-1940409323.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204646006-1061082463.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">.NET 9 环境准备</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">安装 .NET 9 环境，安装 .NET 9 SDK 并且Visual Studio 2022需要更新至17.12版本。</p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>下载.NET 9.0：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://dotnet.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/dotnet/9.0" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://dotnet.microsoft.com/zh-cn/download/dotnet/9.0</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204725520-1866345465.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204740422-1349982466.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">将目标框架切换到.NET 9</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">我们先直接把.NET 8的目标框架切换至.NET 9，假如项目能够正常运行那就说明没有什么需要调整的，有问题在具体问题具体分析。</p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">升级方式</h3>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">选中对应项目右键属性切换对应目标框架版本：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204756023-1411560783.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">WebApi升级</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204814693-596746307.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>运行效果查看：</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">运行下来一切正常！</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204826559-961852603.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">WebUI升级</h3>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204844518-1443799905.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong>运行查看效果：</strong></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">项目运行异常：</p>
<pre data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>(stack=&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;at&nbsp;Microsoft.WebAssembly.Diagnostics.MonoSDBHelper.SendDebuggerAgentCommand[T](T&nbsp;command,&nbsp;MonoBinaryWriter&nbsp;arguments,&nbsp;CancellationToken&nbsp;token,&nbsp;Boolean&nbsp;throwOnError)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;at&nbsp;Microsoft.WebAssembly.Diagnostics.MonoSDBHelper.HasDebugInfoLoadedByRuntimeAsync(String&nbsp;assemblyName,&nbsp;CancellationToken&nbsp;token)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;at&nbsp;Microsoft.WebAssembly.Diagnostics.MonoSDBHelper.GetDataFromAssemblyAndPdbAsync(String&nbsp;assemblyName,&nbsp;Boolean&nbsp;ignoreJMC,&nbsp;CancellationToken&nbsp;token)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;at&nbsp;Microsoft.WebAssembly.Diagnostics.DebugStore.Load(SessionId&nbsp;id,&nbsp;String[]&nbsp;loaded_files,&nbsp;ExecutionContext&nbsp;context,&nbsp;Boolean&nbsp;useDebuggerProtocol,&nbsp;CancellationToken&nbsp;token)+MoveNext())<br></code></pre>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">升级WebAssembly相关包版本：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204910525-901933993.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">运行成功：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105204922360-615070336.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">其他类库升级</h3>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105205025374-1507419987.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器">升级前后端运行效果</h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器">设置多项目运行：</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105205038415-1733708527.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202501/1336199-20250105205050001-533927329.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
